def solved(s): return ''.join(sorted(s if len(s)%2==0 else s[:len(s)//2] + s[(len(s)//2)+1:]))

# Play with the function in your test cases.

def solved(s):
    l = len(s)
    s = s[0:l//2] + s[l//2 + 1:] if l % 2 else s
    s = list(s)
    s.sort()
    return ''.join(s)
